name: py-metric-learn

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
metric-learn contains efficient Python implementations of several
popular supervised and weakly-supervised metric learning algorithms. As
part of scikit-learn-contrib, the API of metric-learn is compatible with
scikit-learn, the leading library for machine learning in Python. This
allows to use all the scikit-learn routines (for pipelining, model
selection, etc) with metric learning algorithms through a unified
interface.

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-scikit-learn
dependencies.description: A set of python modules for machine learning and data mining.

dependencies.description: Fundamental algorithms for scientific computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-smote-variants
dependent_to.description:
Variants of the synthetic minority oversampling technique (SMOTE) for
imbalanced learning
